articles.title: The daily routine of P.F. Chang's CEO Damola Adamolekun
articles.description: Damola Adamolekun drives 20 minutes to the Scottsdale office from home and often visits teams at various restaurant locations to taste-test menus.
articles.content: This as-told-to essay is based on a conversation with Damola Adamolekun, the CEO of the restaurant chain P.F. Chang's, who's based in Scottsdale, Arizona. It has been edited for length and clarity.
